results.content:
The best introductory course for Elementor that I have tried.

Elementor is a big product and can be confusing even for an experience WordPress user.

Step-by-step the tutor takes you through building a functional website from scratch and you end up with with a perfect launchpad on which you can build sites quickly to a professional standard.

Highly recommended.
results.content_html:
The best introductory course for Elementor that I have tried.

Elementor is a big product and can be confusing even for an experience WordPress user.

Step-by-step the tutor takes you through building a functional website from scratch and you end up with with a perfect launchpad on which you can build sites quickly to a professional standard.

Highly recommended.

results.content:
This course was ok. As far as the instructions go - it was basically click here, click there. He did emphasize that you should play around with it yourself as well which was good. 

But you have to take the course for what it is. It is for creating the website that he designed from scratch beforehand. 

I am not a big fan out the website layout overall (spacing and alignment of headings and colums, colour scheme, choice of sizing for certain text elements, etc.)

But I took this course as an opportunity to click around repetitively to get familiar with the Elementor interface. If you take the course with this mindset then it serves that purpose well. 

In terms of explaining, he did mention why he was doing certain things sometimes. But overall, there was no explanation as to what the things he was changing were (e.g he changed the padding, but didn't explain what padding or margins mean. He changed Line Height from EM to PX but didn't explain what that meant.) 

So this course served more as a beginners guide to getting used to navigating Elementor and becoming familiar with where things are within the interface.

results.content: Phenomenal course and I would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting to work with elementor plugin.
